choices: Carmen Reappears In a Fantasy Realm at a GIGANTIC Size with Goddess Powers!
1.content:
The last thing Carmen remembered was booting up some dorky FVMMO out of curiosity that she'd been safekeeping for her loser of a cousin. Normally the delinquent punk girl would've just either refused to safeguard it, smashed the console, or pawned it for some quick cash. But she had to admit she was curious what these damn nerds saw in these things.

Carmen, or 'Carm' as she preferred to be called, wasn't exactly the gamer type...unless it involved loads of blood and gore and brutal violence of course. Carm was a 18 year old punk girl with a fiery temper and a love of picking on weaker, smaller kids...or preppy stuck up assholes...or just anyone really.

The delinquent bully had been expelled from more schools than she could remember, usually for truancy, or fighting, or vandalism or being caught smoking pot..that sort of thing. She was a tall, well built blond girl who was known for being a bully and an accomplished fighter. From an early age Carm had discovered she could use the threat of violence or intimidation to get what she wanted...and boy was she willing to do so.

Carm was feared throughout the halls of RidgeWard High School for being a walking time bomb who would smile at you as she punched your lights out. Her last school she got expelled from rumor has it for punching a teacher. So she already had quite the rep starting out here at RidgeWard.

When Carmen put on the visor after plugging it in, she switched it on and the world went white before she passed out it seemed.

She grunted as she opened her eyes, seeing nothing but a void of apparent data and code all around her. She was dressed in her normal ratty clothes of a t-shirt and black jacket, torn jeans and combat boots. "What the fuck kinda game is this?!" Carmen roared aloud rudely.

A text box appeared in front of her, catching her off guard for a moment. "The fuck is this shit...?" She murmured as she read through it. Carmen may be a delinquent, but she's far from stupid...and as she read the lines of text she found her interest piqued.

ATTENTION: User 1003 congratulations! You have been selected to enter the Realm of Goddesses FULL EXPERIENCE! The FVMMO was a mere test run to decide potential applicants! Upon accepting our Terms and Conditions below, you will be transported to the real dimension which inspired the game

Continuing to read, Carmen read the most interesting part...that she would be granted omnipotence and the power of a giant goddess. Carmen could dig that, she always was a fan of holding power over others, anyone really.

"Huh...maybe this ain't so lame after all..." Carmen gained a sinister smirk as she pressed her finger to the 'Agree to Terms and Conditions' box and a check appeared.

With that, the text box vanished and a blinding light engulfed Carmen...
1.title: Carmen the Delinquent Goddess

choices: Carmen Enters Lakewood, She Wants Information on the area....and Fun of Course
Perhaps Switch Focus to Another Girl Who Has Just Arrived in this World?
11.content:
Opening her eyes as the light faded, Carmen realized she was in a different environment now. All around the girl was a vast green countryside with hills and winding paths. What stood out most however was the fact that she towered over even the tallest hill!

"Whoa..." Carmen said breathlessly. Looking down at her combat boot clad feet, she wiggled her toes in her 2 week old socks which were like a second skin due to the sweat. The sound of squelches and moisture met her ears and she reached over to her arm and gave herself a pinch.

It didn't hurt, seeing as Carm was a tough chick and had been in more than a few brawls, but the sensation was there..meaning this in fact was NOT a dream.

A wide grin broke out on the girl's face and she cheered out: "FUCKING BADASS!" Her voice reverberated throughout the countryside like thunder.

Carmen became aware that she possessed knowledge that she certainly hadn't picked up on her own. It was almost as if it was instinctual. She knew she could grow herself, and she could sense the diminutive population through some sort of feeling of their presence.

Lifting her hands up and curling her fingers inward and outward, she smirked. "I feel...really powerful. I guess that fuckin' long ass text wasn't lying when it said I'd be a goddess."

With that, Carmen lifted up her boot, and took her first steps as a giantess. With a forceful stomp, she left a large print of her boot treads in the grass and dirt. She wore a smug grin as she 'sensed' the nearby town...plenty of people there to terrorize. After all..she was a bully...and now that she had seemingly limitless power...she had no reason to show restraint.

The nearby town of Lakewood was a small humble village currently occupied by a squad of knights from the Imperial Guard. The knights had stopped for resupply on their march back home from battle.

Little did they know that a certain giantess was about to make them wish they'd stayed far away from this town.

They didn't know that they would never make it home to see their families...nor did they know that the entire kingdom would soon be brought to its knees by a giant girl.
11.title: A 60ft Delinquent Means Trouble!

choices: Before he answers, more knights arrive
111.content:
Carmen stomped her way towards the town of Lakewood. As she approached, she noticed a miniscule stone wall standing between the town and the outside world. To a human that wall might seem big, but to her, it was little more than a pebble in her road. As she drew nearer, she was reminded of one clip her friend showed her before she came into this world, and felt the urge to recreate it.

She neared the wall, giddy as a child at the thought of what she was about to do. She raised her right foot and brought it down to kick the stone structure like sand at the beach. Debris flew everywhere, crushing civilians and flattening houses. Anyone not crushed either fled for their lives or just stood there in horror at what just happened.

With terror successfully instilled in these people, Carmen took her first step into town. She laughed to herself as she watched the survivors flee. But she didn't want her fun to end yet. Reaching down, she grabbed several large fragments of the destroyed wall and got into a pitcher's stance. She took aim before one by one throwing the stones into the remaining gates, blocking them and trapping everyone inside. Now to play with her new toys.

The knights rose from their meals at the sounds of crashing and screaming. They grabbed their gear and rushed out to see the sight of a colossal woman stepping through the town's mighty wall like it were a joke. They were horrified at the idea of fighting such a thing, but duty demanded theyvdo so for the sake of the people. The only question now though was... how?

Carmen took notice of the armored band after the glare from one of their helmets reflected into her eye. "Ah good." She starts before walking over and kneeling down in front of them. "Locals."

The knights cpuld hear their armor clang as they shook in fear. It was bad enough before, but now they learned that she knew how to speak?! "M-my giant maiden. You have caused countless amounts of damage and deaths. As captain of the royal guard, I am required to ask you to cease these activities. Otherwise, I am forced to... t-t-to..." The captain stutters through his fear. "Place you under arrest."

"Really?" Carmen questions. "You bugs are gonna arrest me? Let me show you how that's gonna go 'captain'." She says before grabbing the knight in the back that looks like he's pissed himself three times already.

"C-captain!!! Save me!!!" The frightened boy cried out.

"Private, noo!!!" Is all the captain could do while she dangled him helplessly over her mouth.

"Down the hatch." She says before dropping him straight down, letting him slide down her tongue and into her throat, where nothing but her gullet awaited. "Ahhhh, tasty. Now for the rest of you, here's the deal. I need info, and you probably have it. So if you answer all my questions, I might just let you off easy, ut disobey me and I can think of worse fates than what I put that one through. Get it?" She asks.

The men are silent apart from theur still-clanking armor. "Alright then. I guess I gotta prove I'm serious, huh?" She says before grabbing another knight and lifting him up to her other arm.

"Sir?! Save me!!!" He cries out. The captain began to cry at the sight of his soldier helpess and he could do nothing to save him. She lifted her free arm up as he was forced nearer. He stared on in awed horror as he noted the darkened stain where he was heading. He struggled and thrashed while she slides the hand holding him into her sleeve, emphasizing the mass of sweaty flesh he was approaching.

Without ceremony, the giant bully jammed the poor knight into her rank and sweaty pit before rubbing him around like a stick of deodorant. "Oh yeeeaaah. That's the spot. Hey knighty, you might just earn yourself a spot as my personal pit scratcher." She taunts while his eyes water at the burning odor and his entire face is coated in her slimy pit sweat.

Done with her fun with him for now. She sticks him inside with her sweat before lowering her arm on top of him, trapping him. "Okay, so unless you want similar fates to those two, or worse, you'll tell me what I want to know. Got it?" She asks the remaining three knights.

Does the captain conceed to her demands?
111.title: Bullying Info From the Knights

12.content:
Leumya Takoni, or Lily for some people is a true sexy beauty to behold on the planet. At just 21 years of age, she has stunned both the world both as an actress and as a fashion role model. (Image for the girl: http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v333/V...). She has started in a lot of movies of various genres, but her favorite was the kaiju genre as she really does have a major giantess fetish of being a towering size but also sexy monster one day, and many of her movies features her as the giant monster in one way or another. Where ever she is a city destroying giantess, or a children friendly kaiju who watches over a city as its protector, she loves being big.

She also loves looking sexy, doing various bikini and dress photos for all sorts of paparazzi and companies who want to work with her. Many of them even combines her giantess fetish by having her being a towering girl in commercials or in photo shoots as well. It was because of all of that, that the game FVMMO game wanted her to endorse it with a commercial of her as a giantess, which she happily did. Her ad was her strolling in a city like Japan, in a bikini while she was roaring like a kaiju. It surely got a lot of people wanting to play the game for sure, just to see if they would see a kaiju sized Leumya.

Once day, Leumya decided to give the game a test drive herself, so she decided to buy the game and goes to download it. She was extremely rich from all those movies and modeling so it was no issue for her. As she was finish installing the game onto her computer and as she was getting ready to try that game, suddenly a message shows up upon her doing all the signup stuff.

ATTENTION: Congratulations User 5698, you have been chosen to enter the Realm of Goddesses Full Experience, the game was merely a test run for our applicants and upon you accepting the terms and contracts, you will be transported to the dimension that game for based on. Please accept now.

“Oh.... That is interesting but I doubt is true.” Leumya then smiled with a glee as if someone knows might be tricking her, and then she looks at all the details on how she would become a goddess and a giant one at that. Suddenly she then just clicks it and accepts it. “Beside some I doubt it would.... Oh....l” Leumya said just text box vanishes and a light engulfs her slowly.

“Maybe it is...” She said just as she gasps as she is transported into the game.

Wanna use her?
12.title: Leumya the Sexy Kaiju Goddess

choices: Rampage this city and have some monster sized fun
Before she does anything, a NPC suddenly shows up to talk to her
121.content:
Soon, the girl was seen laying down in some sort of unknown area in the world, and just as her eyes begins to open up, she sees some buildings down in the distance with all sort of different cultures and styles, from normal American like buildings, to Japan like buildings, it was something unknown to her that she can't quite picture in her head at all. "Where am I?" she asked just as she noticed that she was on some sort of road on the ground. "Hey uh, why am I seeing the road on the ground?" she said just as she begins to wake up and then begins to rise up and stand her feet on the ground, and suddenly a huge thud was emitted on the ground and parts of the road were smashed before her. She was standing at her full height of about 200ft tall, and she noticed that her clothes wasn't with her, as she was wearing her white with blue outline bikini on herself. "Say... am I big?" she asked just as she notices many of the buildings before her are around her height, with many still much taller than her. She then noticed on the ground that she had damaged the road somehow, and there were alot of cars before her.

"So.... that game managed to make me into a giantess, and not only that, a giant monster in the city?" she thought just as she proceeds to rise her feet over and then brings it down on some cars, crushing them all and exploding them like a monster movie would normally show. "WOW, this is so awesome and cool on so many levels. I wonder, what could I also do? Say, my bikini is nice, but would like something more.... of a beauty goddess like me." she smiled, and then suddenly her bikini turns to pure gold, and it was also adjustable to her frame as well. "Wow, now I feel like a sexy goddess, say... why not I do this...."

She then does some sort of monster like acting just as she was shooting some sort of lasers from her eyes, and then suddenly a powerful laser comes out of her eyes and hits a building, blowing it up in the process like a monster. She then gasped just as she destroyed a building before her with her laser beams. "WOW this is awesome.... Say, I think I shall?!!!!!"
121.title: A New Big Girl in The City

13.content: How about these choices of characters?
13.title: Other Characters..?

choices: Roxie Has Some Fun Right Away!
131.content:
Inspired by: https://www.deviantart.com/darkainarts/a... (Not my artwork)

*************************

"Alright! Sweet!" Roxie cheered as she plopped down on her sofa in her home. The 18 year old magenta haired girl had been dying to try out this revolutionary new device! The Full Dive Headgear! The girl wore a rather sweaty and loose fitting grey tank top, cut-off shorts and blue, quite well worn, blue sneakers.

Her sneakers were almost always worn without socks and among her friends her foot odor was legendary for its potency. Roxie hung out with mostly boys, being seen as a fellow gamer and 'dude' due to her tomboyish nature. Now she sat there on her couch in her messy little apartment...having been so focused on obtaining one of these things she'd allowed changing clothes and even personal hygiene to fall by the wayside.

As she tore open the box, which came packaged with a copy of Realm of the Goddesses, she could hardly contain her excitement. "This is gonna be so badass!" Roxie gushed as she lay down across the couch and booted the headset up.

She activated the program, and felt reality slip away as the Full Dive did its magic.

************************

Roxie opened her eyes and looked around, she was standing in a void. "Huh? Did this stupid thing glitch or something?" Roxie wondered aloud before the void began to melt away to reveal a modern cityscape of sorts.

"What the...thought this was supposed to be some kind of fantasy game!" Roxie crossed her arms and pouted grumpily. However, she raised an eyebrow when she saw that something seemed...off.

The buildings only went up to around her thighs, the tallest structure reached her torso. The puny screams of thousands of people the size of insects met her ears as she looked down. Her eyes bulged, "Woah...I'm HUGE!" Her voice rattled windows with its volume.
131.title: Roxie the Tomboyish Punk Gamer

choices: Hey... She was promised a medieval setting, right?
1311.content:
"First things first, I gotta check." Roxie says before reaching out and pinching her own arm. "Ow! Yup, it's real alright."

"Sooo... I wonder just what I can do here..." She begins to wonder before her thoughts were drowned out by the screams of people below her. Getting frustrated by the noise, she snaps. "Will you all shut up!!!" She booms.

All at once, the people around her grow silent as they stare up in awe at her. "Wait a sec..." She says before spotting a man in a nearby window. Using a finger, she shattered the window in front of him before speaking in. "You there, say something."

"P-please don't kill me." He begs.

So it looks like either she has some sort of powers, or these guys are just spineless enough to obey her every order. "Let's put that powers theory to the test." She says as she spots a nearby car.

Reaching out, she imagined it coming to her hand, and sure enough, the car floated up and flew right into her open palm. "Aw sweet!" She cheers before crushing the car in her fist like a toy.

"Now there's just one more thing I wanna see..." She says while putting her hands on her middling breasts and focusing. As hoped, her breasts soon began to swell from a moderate B-/borderline C-cup, to now an emphasized pair of DDs. "Effin' A. This is cool." She cheers at her new powers. "So, what kind of trouble can a girl like me get into with a world like this?" She wonders.
1311.title: Roxie Investigates A Bit...

choices: Roxy Decides to Spice Things Up a Bit
13111.content:
Roxie suddenly gains a mischievous grin on her pretty face. “Duh, Rox! Of course!” She smacks her palm against her forehead with several windows cracking from the shockwave.

“Hehe, get ready little runts!” Roxie curves her fingers inwards and holds them up. “RoxZilla is comin’!” She lets out a roar and kicks her foot against the apartment building from before.

The punk girl marvels at the weakness of the structure caving in, her foot going through the bricks like a knife through butter. “Hahaha! Sweet!” The girl booms in delight.

Lifting up her other foot as the rest of the building crumbles to the street, she slams her sneaker down on the concrete. She feels her treads sink into the ground and lifts it up to see indeed, she has left an imprint. “Woah-ho! I’m so strong!” She flexes her sleeveless arms with a cocky smirk.

The people down below had resumed their screams, only now the giantess wasn’t annoyed. In fact she enjoyed the terror she was causing these ‘people’.

Taking another step, she crushes a truck into a flat disc beneath her sneaker, grinning smugly in satisfaction as she stomps around like a punk kaiju.
13111.title: A Punk's Rampage

choices: The army arrives to stop her
She's done rampaging and wants to do something else
131111.content:
Roxie then gets a devilish idea as she reaches down and scoops out a chunk of the street. “Ya know, coach did say I gotta work on my pitch…” She taunts as she readies a throw. With a solid overhead toss, she throws the piece of earth into the distance, where it leveled about five buildings. “Strike one.”

She reaches down to pick up another piece and deciding on her next target. This time, she spots a large bridge that people seem to be using to flee town. Taking aim again, she throws the second shot in that direction, slamming it into the bridge and causing it to crumble apart. “Strike two.” She says.

“Now let’s see, what next?” She wonders as she scans the city for her third target. Then it hit her. Why just pick one target?

Taking the ball in her hand, she put her other hand around it. Crushing the massive boulder into multiple smaller rocks. “And here’s the pitch!!” She yells as she throws out the last one, the stones scattering like a grapeshot as they leveled a good half of the city. “Strike three, looks like I win.” She smirks.

What happens next?
131111.title: Roxy Continues Her Rampaging

choices: Roxie Lifts Her Arm and Catches One in Her Pit!
1311111.content:
Roxie suddenly looked up to see a series of fighter jets flying in formation towards her. She grins smugly, “About time the runts’ fighting forces showed up to...TRY to stop me.” She chuckles and dusts off her hands from the gravel.

The pilots split formation and began their assault. They didn’t know where this giantess came from or who she was...but they had a duty to protect the city. At least, what was left of this one.

The jet fired off a missile that impacted Roxie’s cute billboard sized face with an explosion. Roxie scoffed and quirked an eyebrow, “Was that supposed to hurt me?” She swiped at the offending jet, sending it spiraling out of control and crashing into the street.

“Oh no! She got one!” One of the pilots yelped through his communications.

“Keep going! We need to bring her down!” The captain responded.

Roxie gained a thoughtful look, “I wonder…” She closed her eyes and focused. It happened! She was hearing their pitiful panicked thoughts.

“Oooh boy...this just got a whole LOT more interestin’!” Roxy chuckled evilly. Bullets were fired and impacted her bare arms as one of the pilots did a flyby.
1311111.title: The army arrives to stop her

choices: She spares the pilot in demand for his servitude
She grows bored and disposes of him
She traps another plane in the other pit
13111111.content:
As one of the planes was making another pass around her, Roxie lifted her arm up a bit, exposing her unwashed pit to the world. The plane began to go through the space under her arm, only for her to quickly snap it down on top of him, trapping him in the sweaty prison. The pilot began to panic as he now found himself stuck. He worried how he was gonna survive this, even if she did free his plane.

“Well, look at that. I managed to get a little fly stuck in my pit.” The giant woman taunts. She then begins to increase the pressure on the tiny plane as she squeezed her arm even tighter around him. “I just hope he doesn’t get crushed in there and gets his guts all over.” She continues as the pressure increased even more.

The pilot panicked more and more as he could hear the plane around him strain at the intense pressure around him. Cracks were beginning to form in the glass of the cockpit, causing her sweat to begin flowing in, as well as her noxious, vinegary odor. Now the pilot had even more to worry about. Even if he could endure the pressure, soon enough, this sweat was gonna fill the cockpit soon enough, drowning him in this woman’s sweat.

His fellow pilots could only watch on in horror as their friend was almost certainly dead at this point. Reading his mind, Roxie could hear the fear in his mind as he worried how he was gonna get out of this. He then started to beg whoever was listening to spare him from this fate. He said he’d do anything it took to be free of this.

Roxie laughed at his pathetic begging as she continued her squeezing. Meanwhile, the pilot’s air tanks were ruptured, meaning he now had to inhale the odor flowing into his plane. He coughed and hacked as he started to get a good whiff of the stuff. His begging only increased after that, hoping he’d get free.

That was when she decided to lay it on him. “So, you really want someone to save you from this, huh?” She taunts as she squeezes once more, forcing more noxious fumes inside. Inside the man’s head was now increased fear at the idea that she was reading his thoughts. The other pilots heard this too as they began to fear what she could do with the ability to read their minds.

What happens next?
13111111.title: Roxie Lifts Her Arm and Catches One in Her Pit!

choices: Roxy Suffocates Him in Her Pit
131111113.content:
One of the other fighter jets attempted to do a flyby run, pelting the magenta haired giantess with ineffective bullets. Roxie scoffed and caught it in the hand attached to her currently ‘occupied’ pit. Bringing the pitiful little ‘fly’ up to her narrowed eyes she scowled at this pest.

“Hmph! Can’t you see me and your buddy were having a conversation? Pretty rude of ya to interrupt…” She said as a smirk formed on her face and she delicately brought the tiny plane over to her other side.

She took her time and slowly lifted this arm, the plump flesh coming unstuck from her side with a sickening peeling sound.

The waft of vinegary, sour b.o came out accompanied by a blast of steam and hot air that fogged up the pilot’s windshield. The man coughed as her fingers put pressure on the front of the plane and blasted open the windshield. “There! Now you won’t have anything between you and my soft skin!” Roxie boomed with a laugh.

The giantess slowly inched the plane closer to her visibly greasy armpit.
131111113.title: She traps another plane in the other pit

choices: She finishes off the one in her pit
She frees the one begging to demand tribute
The third pilot makes his attack
1311111131.content:
The man was horrified as he was forced to rub against her dank pit. His seatbelt made any hope of escape impossible and he was so coated in her sweat that he was unable to free himself from it. All he could do was sit there as her pit skin pressed the air from his lungs. He hoped something could end this torment already.

Then, to his terrified mind, he remembered that this girl was able to read minds. “Sooo, the little buggy just wants this to end, huh? I’d be careful what I wish for if I were you.” She taunts as she presses his plane even harder against her skin.
The smell worsened as he felt his head be almost completely buried in her pit flesh. He wanted to cough, but any attempt to cough only filled his mouth with her sweat. It was absolute hell for the poor man as he was starting to choke on her smell.

Like his friend in the other pit, he soon found his cockpit filling with her pit sweat. He didn’t think this could get any worse until he found himself stewing in her salty fluids. At this point, he didn’t even care if she killed him, so long as this nightmare was over and done with already. Roxie smirked as she heard this thought, relishing at how easily she broke him.

Meanwhile, she heard two more thoughts. The first was from the pilot in her other pit, still desperately begging someone to save him. The other was from the last pilot, the one still flying around. She could hear him thinking up another attack to try and save his buddies. She smirked at the one’s submission and the other’s hopeful optimism.

What does she do?
1311111131.title: Roxy Suffocates Him in Her Pit

choices: Roxie Slides the Final Jet Down the Back of Her Pants!
Roxie Uses That Cable to Turn the Jet Into a Yo-Yo!
13111111313.content:
The final pilot decided to make his move, Roxie’s smirk never left her face as she could hear his thoughts..and his plan.

But what fun is it if she didn’t play along? So she would let him believe he had a chance...and then crush his hope before his eyes.

Sure enough, the gamer girl was right as he did a flyby maneuver and a long, reinforced cable was spat out from the rear of the jet. Roxie suppressed a chuckle as the meager thread began to wrap around her legs.

“Oh noo! What is this?!” Roxie feigned surprise as she clumsily ‘attempted’ to swat at the jet.

The cable was wrapping around her legs, how cliche...this is the best he had?

“Uh oooh! I’m gonna falll!” Roxie bellowed, waving her arms around to pretend to keep her balance, squeezing and smushing her pit prisoners even more.

She could hear the thoughts of this pilot, he was totally buying it! She almost pitied him for what she was about to do.

As the jet made it’s final pass, the cables wrapping around her legs, Roxie made her move. “Ya know, I might get the wrong idea with you flying around that area…” Roxie caught the jet in her fingers and the cable unravelled.
13111111313.title: Fun and Games

choices: She spots a guy she's interested in.
She decides to finish off what's left of the city
131111113131.content:
“Well, since you wanted to be there so badly…” Roxie says as she reaches back and grabs the waistband of her shorts and panties and pulls them back, revealing her bare ass to the now scared pilot. “Then have fun back there.” She says before slowly sliding the plane into her shorts.

The terrified man watched as his windshield’s view was filled by the sight of the sweaty mountains that were her asscheeks. His plane went right down the middle, finding itself now at rest in the dank canyon in between them. With her newest victim in place, Roxie then snapped her shorts back into place, securing the pilot in her crack.

“Oh wait, almost forgot.” She says as she reaches back to cup her cheeks before focusing again. Like with her new chest, she could feel her ass grow bigger and rounder. As they grew, they snapped the wings off of the plane between them, dooming the man inside to being unable to fly if he ever got out. With her growth complete, she felt up her new butt. It was nice and round with plenty there for her to squeeze if she wanted to.

“Oh yeah. Now this is an ass a girl can use.” She says before smacking her right cheek, causing ripples to flow throughout and assault the tiny plane. “Well, that takes care of you little flies for a while. Now what?” She wonders.
131111113131.title: Roxie Slides the Final Jet Down the Back of Her...

choices: She Teases Him, a Little Prank to Break the Ice
She Eases His Fears Right Away
1311111131311.content:
It was then Roxie spotted a man around her age with spiked hair, standing on a rooftop and staring at her. It was clear this young man was unafraid...for whatever reason.

The magenta haired giantess raised an eyebrow, curious as to why this single runt wasn’t running all panicked and scared. Peering into his mind, she found her face flushing a bit. He was having quite lewd thoughts about her, and not just that...it was all seemingly focused on her being a giantess.

Some of his thoughts involved her crushing cities like pebbles beneath her feet. Others involved her stuffing entire planets into her pits. But the most flattering ones were of them both being a couple and her loving all over him.

“Geez, well..he is cute..and a girl could use some appreciation.” She thought, turning her attention to him and stomping over.

The boy, realizing he’d been found out began to panic and book it to the fire escape. “Hold it, little guy!” She boomed and caught him in her grip.

“Aahhh! Please don’t eat me!” He yelled.

How does she respond?
1311111131311.title: Potential Love Interest?

choices: Their moment is ruined as reinforcements arrive
13111111313111.content:
“Eat you? Now there’s an idea.” Roxie says to herself before tilting back her head a bit and holding him over her mouth. As she began to lower him down in head-first, she opened her mouth wide as if ready to drop him right in. As the boy’s head went past her lips, he closed his eyes in fear of what was to come.

That was when she revealed her trick, closing her lips around his torso as she lashed out her tongue, licking all across his face like a piece of candy. He tensed at this action, fearing it was simply her tasting him before she finally swallowed. But that moment never came. Instead, her felt the fingers that never left his leg begin to pull him back through the soft lips back outside the dark cave.

As his head passed through her lips, she suddenly puckered them around him, effectively kissing him as he made his exit. Once outside, he was blushing with a mixture of embarrassment and confusion as he looked up at the giant girl. “Got ya.” She says with a giggle as she flips him so he now rests on her palm.

“Y-you mean you’re not gonna eat me?” He asks.

“Nah. I was just messing with you.” She tells him. “You should’ve seen your face.” She laughs.

“So… why did you spare me?” He questions.

“Because I’m interested in you and I think I can have some fun.” She tells him. “Why? Do you want me to eat you after all?”

“N-no no. That’s okay.” He refuses in a panic.

“Good to hear.” She replies.

What happens next?
13111111313111.title: She Teases Him, a Little Prank to Break the Ice

131111113131111.content:
“Well, I’m Roxie...I suppose I am the new goddess in town.” Roxie giggles with a smug smirk.

“I-I’m Eric, your highness…” Eric said with a bow of his head. Roxie purred at that, “Your highness, huh? I like that. You should feel grateful, little guy...it’s not every day you get the attention of a goddess.” Roxie winked playfully.

“T-thank you...you’re so beautiful!” He blurted out suddenly.

Roxie smiled and puffed out her enhanced chest, “Yeah, I know. I’m great. So I peered into your mind and saw you’re a fan of big girls like me, eh?”

Eric blushed, “Y-yes...it’s kind of a um...kink.”

Roxie raised an eyebrow, “Do tell.”

“It’s just a fantasy...like a power fantasy I guess...an all powerful giantess like yourself...being in total control and stuff.” Eric blushed as he explained.
“Looks like I was a dream come true for ya, huh?” She teased him and stuck her tongue out.

“Y-yes...it was amazing how you dealt with those jets.” Eric compliments her.
131111113131111.title: Introductions are in order

choices: She lets him get a "better look" at them
She sets him on her shoulder while she continues her destruction
1311111131311111.content:
“Oh yeah? Tell me about it, then.” Roxie requests with fluttering eyes.

“It’s awesome to see just how much power you have in just one armpit.” Eric begins. “To be able to stop a military jet with such ease is amazing.”

“Those two might disagree with you on that one, but do go on.” She says.

“Well, it’s amazing to see so much power from a woman that still looks so… normal.” He continues.

“What part of a fifty foot goddess rampaging is normal to you?” She questions.

“I just mean that you look like just a normal girl, but bigger. It’s not like you’re one of those women that are more muscle than anything else.” He backpedals. “You have such a great figure. Nice, sexy body, a rear that can crush a jet, your…” He starts only to lose track of his thoughts as he looks down at her enlarged breasts.

Roxie quickly picks up on his staring and decides to tease him a bit. “Yeees? Go ooon. My what?” She asks, pressing her free arm under them to push them up so he gets a better view, making him blush harder.

“Y-your lovely and bountiful breasts.” He finishes, terrified of her response to that. Instead of getting mad, though, she simply chuckled at his fear. “Relax kid. What woman is going to hate a guy complimenting her as long as he’s not a creep about it?” She tells him.

“I… see your point.” He realizes.

What happens next?
1311111131311111.title: Eric Compliments Her 'Work'

info.brief_description: When a virtual reality game becomes real, fetish fun is not far behind!
info.description:
-Fully Virtual Massively Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game (FVMMO - RPG)-

The year is 2024. Virtual reality has finally reached the point everyone thought only existed in sci-fi and popular anime. In the past year the Full Dive Headgear was released on the market after demos and testing.

Needless to say, everyone had to have one. The first game released to the public was the most obvious one: an epic fantasy game entitled Realm of the Goddesses.

It was an instant hit and bestseller, everyone wanted to walk around and go on quests as their favorite fantasy race.

It was completely up to the players how they wished to enjoy the game. It was almost like living a second life, one as a normal person in the 'real' world, and the other as a dwarf king or any number of other options.

However, unexpectedly...players began to disappear. Never logging back on. Even those who kept in contact with their friends through other means, were never heard from anywhere.

Strangely, all of the missing persons were female top tier players. People suspected foul play of some sort, and the company responsible for the game came under scrutiny...but denied any wrongdoing and were not suspects.

Unknown to everyone....they were still alive. The ones who vanished had been chosen when the time came to....'go to the next level'.

What this next level was....was godhood in an entirely different dimension that the virtual game was a mere copy of.

~Rules~

1. Characters MUST meet the age minimum of 17+. NO EXCEPTIONS!

2. No scat/toilet/watersports.

3. Please make sure your chapters are coherent and there is a 3 paragraph minimum requirement!

4. Female giants ONLY. Males can be present as other characters though like the peasants and knights etc.

5. Have fun!
